item.title: 【Instrumentals / Karaoke (lossless)】FLAC - David Guetta [feat. Flo Rida, Nicki Minaj] - Where Them Girls At - [Almost Studio Acapella]
item.description:
​

This is mostly another post of shame. Two people (1, 2) are offering FLAC files of the "studio acapella" for a measly $10 (and 10 Euros), so I copied their methods and I'm posting it for free. This is the cleanest acapella that you'll probably ever get unless the raw stems are leaked. I took the song and inverted it on top of the corresponding released instrumental. The main melody's synth was a lot louder in the instrumental due to different mastering compression than with vocals, so I put the file through the algorithm MVSEP to get rid of the synth. Finally I ran the new track through iZotope RX 10 to get rid of crackling caused by distortion in the vocals (it seems that Nicki's mic either ran too hot or David's DAW started crackling.

The file was stemmed from a 44.1kHz/16-bit WAV file, and is now in FLAC [Level 8]. Have at it.

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: infurtile
